# draggingFormation

**Instance Property**

The formation of the dragging items while the drag is over the destination.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var draggingFormation: NSDraggingFormation { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to change the formation of the drag items. This is generally done during the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/updateDraggingItemsForDrag(_:)] method or whenever you enumerate the dragging items.

The default value is the current drag formation.



## Sliding the image

- **slideDraggedImage(to:)**: Slides the image to a specified location.
- **animatesToDestination**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the dragging formation animates while the drag is over the destination.
